attributes.action: stand down as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the PM's extremely unpopular, slavish, and on-going support for the US and it's appalling foreign policies, and the danger in which this has placed our country in terms of potential terrorist action,not to mention a catastrophic loss of international respect and credibility, it is my contention that he should stand down immediatly. To partially paraphrase Churchill and Cromwell, "_____ In the name of God, be gone!"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
